div.a: Yes, Randi Zuckerberg, Please Lecture Us About 'Human Decency'

div.div: Randi Zuckerberg, sister of Mark Zuckerberg, threw a fit when someone tweeted a copy of a Zuckerberg family photo that Randi herself had posted to Facebook, the confusing-to-use social Web site created by her strange, reclusive brother. Does she have a leg to stand on?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VyYu1T&via=Digg&text=Yes, Randi Zuckerberg, Please Lecture Us About 'Human Decency'

div.div: With 2012 coming to a close, it’s only natural to look back at the history-making events that have defined this year. From hail storms in Texas, to Holi in India, people have been using Instagram to document and share the world around them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WRDDhc&via=Digg&text=Documenting 2012 Through Instagram

div.div: They were at the forefront of the digital revolution when they launched over a decade ago, but UK sales of iPods and other MP3 players slumped by more than fifth in 2012 as consumers turned to smartphones as their gadget of choice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12OtYYe&via=Digg&text=MP3 Players Are Dead

div.div: Well, it’s taken 80 years, but the post–New Deal, post-military-industrial-complex mega-state has finally come up with a single good idea: the construction and deployment of a mobile, moon-sized, planet-killing death ray in outer space.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V46Y35&via=Digg&text=Build The Death Star

div.a: Advanced Humanoid Roboy To Be ‘Born’ In Nine Months

div.div: Meet Roboy, “one of the most advanced humanoid robots,” say researchers at the Artificial Intelligence Laboratory of the University of Zurich.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TXM6e5&via=Digg&text=Advanced Humanoid Roboy To Be ‘Born’ In Nine Months

div.a: The Largest Mass Execution In US History Was 150 Years Ago Today

div.div: December 26, 1862: thirty-eight Dakota Indians were hung in Mankato, Minnesota, in the largest mass execution in US history – on orders of President Abraham Lincoln.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12FDf5U&via=Digg&text=The Largest Mass Execution In US History Was 150 Years Ago Today

div.div: An infographic exploration of animal longevity, from hare-today-gone-tomorrow to near-eternal-tortoises.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WzYUbl&via=Digg&text=How Long Do Animals Live?

div.a: What Did We Get Stuck In Our Rectums This Year?

div.div: As in past years, the Sun Sentinel has created a searchable database of emergency room visits around the country. And as in past years, we have trolled the data for the finest examples of insertions showcasing extraordinarily bad luck and/or ingenuity.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V36iL8&via=Digg&text=What Did We Get Stuck In Our Rectums This Year?

div.a: Three Decades Of Presidential Losers: Where Are They Now?

div.div: Mitt Romney has been laying low since his electoral drubbing. What about his predecessors?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UmfxI1&via=Digg&text=Three Decades Of Presidential Losers: Where Are They Now?

div.a: Become A Crime-Fighting Superhero In Your Spare Time

div.div: Chris Goodroe doesn’t do Facebook, and he doesn’t do Twitter. Online socializing isn’t his thing. But after watching his neighbors use the internet to bust a pair of burglars earlier this year, the Oakland attorney decided to make an exception for Nextdoor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V4jFdY&via=Digg&text=Become A Crime-Fighting Superhero In Your Spare Time

div.a: A Simple Introduction To Computer Programming

div.div: Telling a computer what to do is actually quite simple when broken down.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12JBHqC&via=Digg&text=A Simple Introduction To Computer Programming

div.div: They are expensive because they are difficult to grow, hard to find in the wild, in decline because of climate change and habitat loss, and in high demand. But if they're so difficult to deal with, why are truffles so highly sought?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VcRDMH&via=Digg&text=Why Are Truffles So Delicious?

div.a: Why You Should Care About The Bradley Manning Trial

div.div: Bradley Manning is a United States Army private accused of passing classified military and diplomatic documents to WikiLeaks, the whistle-blowing document-sharing website. Here's why you should care about his ongoing trial.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U6RTMW&via=Digg&text=Why You Should Care About The Bradley Manning Trial

div.div: After years of sometimes bizarre research, why are scientists still baffled by the 1918 Spanish flu?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WRG9DW&via=Digg&text=The Worst Pandemic In History

div.a: Family Got Kinda Weird This Christmas

div.div: It's ok if it's your 4th cousin, right? Right?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YMqCpz&via=Digg&text=Family Got Kinda Weird This Christmas

div.a: A History Of President Obama Pressing Two Fingers To His Lips

div.div: When he finds himself in deep thought, President Obama prefers to turn to the nearest window and stare out of it. But what if there are no windows to look through?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9Hgcl&via=Digg&text=A History Of President Obama Pressing Two Fingers To His Lips

div.div: WE'RE PRETTY SURE THE 'D' IS SILENT
As always with Tarantino, there's a lot more going on beneath the surface that connects the movie to its precedents in film history as well as Tarantino's own unique career.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VaiOb1&via=Digg&text=The 'Django Unchained' Cheat Sheet

div.div: Since 2004 England-based Simon Beck has strapped on a pair of snowshoes and lumbered out into the the freshly fallen snow at the Les Arcs ski resort in France to trample out his distinctly geometric patterns, footprint by footprint.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VuIVbq&via=Digg&text=Trampled Snow Art

div.a: The New Ethanol Blend May Damage Your Vehicle

div.div: The EPA will require that gas pumps with 15% ethanol bear a warning sign noting that the blend is not recommended for cars older than the 2001 model year. But what happens if you accidentally use it?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W3eCJM&via=Digg&text=The New Ethanol Blend May Damage Your Vehicle

div.a: Cops Told NBC Not To Use Gun Clip, Investigating Host

div.div: NBC was told by the Washington, D.C., police that it was “not permissible” to show a high-capacity gun magazine on air before Sunday’s “Meet the Press,” according to a statement Wednesday from the cops.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W58qAZ&via=Digg&text=Cops Told NBC Not To Use Gun Clip, Investigating Host

div.a: Newspaper Posts Map With Names And Addresses Of Gun Permit Holders

div.div: "Where are the gun permits in your neighborhood?" That's the question posed by The Journal News, a New York newspaper that published a Google map on Sunday that shows the names and addresses of pistol or revolver permits in Westchester and Rockland counties.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12D6YMB&via=Digg&text=Newspaper Posts Map With Names And Addresses Of Gun Permit Holders

div.a: Beer Cranked To 11: A Field Guide To Music-Inspired Brews

div.div: Beer and music—clearly two of life’s twin pleasures, but how much more awesome is it when the brew you’re drinking actually connects to the tunes on the speakers?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VfF2eT&via=Digg&text=Beer Cranked To 11: A Field Guide To Music-Inspired Brews

div.a: Beached Whale Washes Up In New York City

div.div: A whale about 30 feet long, possibly a humpback, washed up on the beach alive at Breezy Point in Queens on Wednesday morning, the police said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V3MFCl&via=Digg&text=Beached Whale Washes Up In New York City

div.a: Drake Wants Royalties For YOLO Merchandise

div.div: It's true — you only do live once, and in this lifetime, Drake wants a check for all that YOLO merchandise.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WO9L5p&via=Digg&text=Drake Wants Royalties For YOLO Merchandise

div.a: The History Of The Universe In 127 Seconds

div.div: A lot of stuff happened, apparently.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W0pCHr&via=Digg&text=The History Of The Universe In 127 Seconds

div.a: Let's Go Flying Over The 'Fiscal Cliff'

div.div: President Obama is cutting his Christmas holiday short, returning to Washington for a last attempt at avoiding the fiscal cliff. But would it be so bad if we went flying off the cliff?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V4AipU&via=Digg&text=Let's Go Flying Over The 'Fiscal Cliff'

div.div: Dozens of members of an Indian tribe said to be lost descendants of ancient Israelites have emigrated to Israel after the government lifted a visa ban.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ThJzMY&via=Digg&text=Israel Takes In 'Lost Tribe' Members

div.a: What Life Sounds Like On The International Space Station

div.div: Commander Chris Hadfield decided to share a bit of life on the International Space Station and took a recording of the ambient noise aboard the craft.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZzVYRE&via=Digg&text=What Life Sounds Like On The International Space Station

div.a: How The Queen Of England Beat Everyone To The Internet

div.div: That’s Her Majesty in the photo above, and if the year isn’t immediately obvious from the computer terminal she’s typing on — or from her attire — you can find it on the wall, just to her left, printed on one of the signs trumpeting the arrival of the ARPANET.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YIhvGo&via=Digg&text=How The Queen Of England Beat Everyone To The Internet

div.div: WE ALREADY KNOW IT WILL BLEND

div.a: Is The iPhone 5 Prone To Bending?

div.div: Apparently, the iPhone 5 is suffering from what might be called a "flexibility issue."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V4cOBe&via=Digg&text=Is The iPhone 5 Prone To Bending?
